org.trimou.handlebars

Class HelpersBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trimou.handlebars.HelpersBuilder

  • public final class HelpersBuilder
extends Object
    A simple builder for helpers map. It's useful when registering built-in/basic helpers with sensible default names (each, if, etc.) - no need to explicitly declare a helper name. 
     HelpersBuilder.empty().addSet().addIsEven().add("myHelperName", new MyHelper())
         .build();
    Author:
    Martin Kouba
    See Also:
    MustacheEngineBuilder.registerHelpers(Map), MustacheEngineBuilder.registerHelpers(Map, boolean)

      • builtin

        public static HelpersBuilder builtin()
        Built-in helpers are registered automatically if EngineConfigurationKey.HANDLEBARS_SUPPORT_ENABLED set to true.
        Returns:
        a new builder, all built-in helpers are added automatically
        See Also:
        addBuiltin()

      • extra

        public static HelpersBuilder extra()
        Returns:
        a new builder, extra helpers are added automatically
        See Also:
        addExtra()

      • all

        public static HelpersBuilder all()
        Returns:
        a new builder, all available helpers are addded automatically
